title: Implicitly Defined - relative rates of change

content.description: In the <math alttext="x y"><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></math>-plane, two points on the graph of an implicitly defined function are close together and have coordinates <math alttext="open parentheses 1 comma 2 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="open parentheses 1.2 comma 2.05 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>1.2</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2.05</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>. The portion of the graph connecting these two points is a curve with no holes. Which of the following is true?
content.question: Note: Assume that when the absolute value of the slope is greater than <math alttext="1"><mn>1</mn></math>, a curve is considered steep. Assume that when the absolute value of the slope is between <math alttext="0"><mn>0</mn></math> and <math alttext="1"><mn>1</mn></math>, the curve is considered shallow.

choices.label: On the interval between <math alttext="open parentheses 1 comma 2 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="open parentheses 1.2 comma 2.05 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>1.2</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2.05</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>, as <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math> increases, <math alttext="y"><mi>y</mi></math> increases steeply.

On the interval between <math alttext="open parentheses 1 comma 2 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="open parentheses 1.2 comma 2.05 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>1.2</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2.05</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>, as <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math> increases, <math alttext="y"><mi>y</mi></math> increases shallowly.

On the interval between <math alttext="open parentheses 1 comma 2 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="open parentheses 1.2 comma 2.05 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>1.2</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2.05</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>, as <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math> increases, <math alttext="y"><mi>y</mi></math> decreases steeply.

On the interval between <math alttext="open parentheses 1 comma 2 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="open parentheses 1.2 comma 2.05 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>1.2</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2.05</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>, as <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math> increases, <math alttext="y"><mi>y</mi></math> decreases shallowly.

content.answer: On the interval between <math alttext="open parentheses 1 comma 2 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="open parentheses 1.2 comma 2.05 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>1.2</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2.05</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>, as <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math> increases, <math alttext="y"><mi>y</mi></math> increases shallowly.

unit.text: 4: Functions Involving Parameters, Vectors, and Matrices (Not assessed on the AP Exam)

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
